"Oh, <%me>! What's up, amazed to find me: "The situation with our universe is stable. That's why, while we still have time, I thought I'd explore around here."
"I've read the reports about how the situation here keeps getting bigger. A full scale confrontation is a likely possibility."
"But that won't mean a thing if I, a symbol of ARKS, can do anything about it, using my full strength!"
"Though, I don't feel any differences: there seems to be no issues regarding the atmosphere and gravity; I'm sure anyone could go all-out in this place."
"Of course, if we can go without fighting, then that would be our best case scenario. HAHAHAHA!"
"Huey, <%me>! I apologize, but there's an emergency!"
"I've detected a large Ether reading, close to your location. I ask of you both, to investigate immediately."
"This reading... It might be a Phantom creation similar to a Dark Falz-type enemy! Please investigate immediately!"
"Give us a break... Is this what they call, \"Speaking of the Devil\"?"
"The readings emanate from up ahead!"
"I... have arrived! I don't know what's going on, but when Huey is here, everything will be-"
"...O-hey Xiera. I thought you said it was here?"

"Uh, huh? There were definitely readings...
But they're starting to fade...?"
"I was following a presence I thought was powerful, however this was all it had. Such a turn-off."
"Oh, that's <%me> over there."
"Did that happen to be your prey, by any chance? I apologize for taking your kill."
"Although, it didn't put up much resistance. And I feel unsatisfied still."
"To return empty handed... wouldn't be good for either of us, would it?"
"Oh?"
"Hey, hey, hey... You're a feisty one, alright!"
"Such absurd strength and reflexes... I see, you're that \"demon,\" everyone is referring to on that report, aren't you?"
"For you to have stopped my attack. As expected from the rumored Council of Six."
"You don't seem to be the type who would back down."
"Yes, as I said earlier. I'm not satisfied yet. So, would you mind entertaining me for a bit?"
"TEST"
